user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Infrastructure
epics.summary: Set up the base environment and project architecture
epics.description: Initiate the project by establishing the necessary technical foundation including repositories, environments, frameworks, and continuous integration tools. Define architecture patterns, version control policies, and dependencies to ensure scalability, maintainability, and team-wide consistency from the start.

epics.title: User Authentication and Access Control
epics.summary: Implement user authentication and access management
epics.description: Implement a secure and flexible authentication system allowing users to register, log in, and recover passwords. Introduce role-based permissions to define access levels for different user types. Focus on data security, session management, and compliance with modern authentication standards.

epics.title: Core Functional Modules
epics.summary: Develop the main business logic and core features
epics.description: Build the fundamental components of the product that deliver core business value. Define entities, establish workflows, and integrate business rules that align with project objectives. Design APIs and database interactions to support seamless data operations and application scalability.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience
epics.summary: Design and build responsive and user-friendly interfaces
epics.description: Create intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces that provide users with an engaging experience. Ensure responsiveness across all devices and browsers. Utilize consistent styling, standardized UI components, and feedback-driven enhancements to improve overall usability.

epics.title: Integrations and Advanced Features
epics.summary: Add third-party integrations and advanced functionality
epics.description: Extend platform capabilities through integration with external APIs, services, or tools such as analytics, notifications, or payment systems. Build advanced features like reports, dashboards, or automation utilities. Ensure each integration adheres to security standards and optimizes overall performance.

epics.title: Testing, Deployment, and Monitoring
epics.summary: Ensure quality assurance, deploy to production, and monitor performance
epics.description: Conduct comprehensive testing including unit, integration, and regression testing to identify and resolve issues before release. Set up automated deployment pipelines and establish monitoring solutions for performance tracking and troubleshooting. Maintain post-deployment feedback loops for continuous improvement.
